channel.title: so on Sparrowyang
channel.description: Recent content in so on Sparrowyang

item.title: c语言动态库
item.description: 动态库的构建 编写库 fun.h: 1 void info(); fun.c: 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <stdio.h>#include "fun.h" void info(){ printf("you know me!"); } 编译 1 gcc -fPIC -shared fun.c -o libfun123.so 使用 main.c: 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include "fun.h"int main(int argc, char const *argv[]) { info(); return 0; } 1 gcc main.c libfun123.so -o app.out 此时检查编
